```{r}
#create a list of forest objects

forest_objs = list()

for(s in 1:S){
  forest_objs[[s]]<- Forest$new()
  forest_objs[[s]]$init(timeseries_fmri_std[[s]])
  forest_objs[[s]]$randomInitZ()
}
```

```{r}

for(step in 1:1000){
  for(s in 1:S){
    res<- sampleZ(forest_objs[[s]],forest_objs[[s]]$Z,rho = 0.01)
    forest_objs[[s]]$Z<- res[[1]]
    forest_objs[[s]]$logTreePrior<- res[[2]]
    forest_objs[[s]]$MCMC_oneScan()
  }
}


```
